languages.text: {n}Мужчина не выглядит удивленным.{/n} "Император-Пращур донес до меня эхо их гибели, пусть я и не знал их прежде. И образ. Твой образ. Но их гибель не имеет значения, ведь ты явил{mf|ся|ась} на зов. Я рад".

{n}The man does not look surprised.{/n} "Though I had not known them before, the Emperor-Progenitor brought me the echo of their deaths, and an image — your image. But their deaths matter not, for you have answered the call. I am elated."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина не выглядит удивленным.{/n} "Император-Пращур донес до меня эхо их гибели, пусть я и не знал их прежде. И образ. Твой образ. Но их гибель не имеет значения, ведь ты явил{mf|ся|ась} на зов. Я рад".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man does not look surprised.{/n} "The Emperor-Progenitor brought me the echo of their deaths, even though I had not known them before. And your image. But their deaths matter not, for you have answered the call. I am elated."

{n}The man does not look surprised.{/n} "The Emperor-Progenitor brought me the echo of their deaths, even though I had not known them before. And your image. But their deaths matter not, for you have answered the call. I am elated."

{n}The man does not look surprised.{/n} "Though I had not known them before, the Emperor-Progenitor brought me the echo of their deaths, and an image — your image. But their deaths matter not, for you have answered the call. I am elated."

languages.text: {n}El hombre no parece sorprendido.{/n} «Aunque no los conocía, el Emperador-Progenitor me trajo el eco de sus muertes y una imagen: la suya. Pero sus muertes no importan, pues ha respondido a la llamada. Estoy pletórico».
languages.original_text: {n}The man does not look surprised.{/n} "Though I had not known them before, the Emperor-Progenitor brought me the echo of their deaths, and an image — your image. But their deaths matter not, for you have answered the call. I am elated."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre no parece sorprendido.{/n} «Aunque no los conocía, el Emperador-Progenitor me trajo el eco de sus muertes y una imagen: la suya. Pero sus muertes no importan, pues ha respondido a la llamada. Estoy pletórico».

languages.text: {n}男は驚いた様子はないようだ。{/n}「私はそれまで彼らを知らなかったが、皇帝の始祖が彼らの死の響き、そして映像…あなたの映像を教えてくれた。しかし、彼らの死は問題ではない。あなたは答えたから。私は興奮しているんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The man does not look surprised.{/n} "Though I had not known them before, the Emperor-Progenitor brought me the echo of their deaths, and an image — your image. But their deaths matter not, for you have answered the call. I am elated."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は驚いた様子はないようだ。{/n}「私はそれまで彼らを知らなかったが、皇帝の始祖が彼らの死の響き、そして映像…あなたの映像を教えてくれた。しかし、彼らの死は問題ではない。あなたは答えたから。私は興奮しているんだ」

languages.text: {n}这个男人看起来丝毫不惊讶。{/n}“尽管我之前并不认识他们，但元祖神皇为我带来了他们死亡的回声，让我看到了某个形象——你的形象。他们的死亡无关紧要，因为你已经响应了召唤，这让我无比欣喜。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man does not look surprised.{/n} "Though I had not known them before, the Emperor-Progenitor brought me the echo of their deaths, and an image — your image. But their deaths matter not, for you have answered the call. I am elated."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个男人看起来丝毫不惊讶。{/n}“尽管我之前并不认识他们，但元祖神皇为我带来了他们死亡的回声，让我看到了某个形象——你的形象。他们的死亡无关紧要，因为你已经响应了召唤，这让我无比欣喜。”

languages.text: {n}Der Mann wirkt nicht überrascht.{/n} "Ich hatte sie zuvor nicht gekannt, doch der Imperator-Progenitor hat mir das Echo ihres Todes übermittelt, zusammen mit einem Bild – Eurem Bild. Doch Ihr Tod ist unbedeutend, denn Ihr seid dem Ruf gefolgt. Ich bin hocherfreut."
languages.original_text: {n}The man does not look surprised.{/n} "Though I had not known them before, the Emperor-Progenitor brought me the echo of their deaths, and an image — your image. But their deaths matter not, for you have answered the call. I am elated."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann wirkt nicht überrascht.{/n} "Ich hatte sie zuvor nicht gekannt, doch der Imperator-Progenitor hat mir das Echo ihres Todes übermittelt, zusammen mit einem Bild – Eurem Bild. Doch Ihr Tod ist unbedeutend, denn Ihr seid dem Ruf gefolgt. Ich bin hocherfreut."

languages.text: {n}L'homme ne semble pas surpris.{/n} « Je ne les connaissais pas, mais l'Empereur-Géniteur m'a fait parvenir les échos de leur mort, ainsi qu'une image... votre image. Peu importe leur trépas, puisque vous avez répondu à l'appel, j'ai tout lieu de me réjouir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man does not look surprised.{/n} "Though I had not known them before, the Emperor-Progenitor brought me the echo of their deaths, and an image — your image. But their deaths matter not, for you have answered the call. I am elated."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme ne semble pas surpris.{/n} « Je ne les connaissais pas, mais l'Empereur-Géniteur m'a fait parvenir les échos de leur mort, ainsi qu'une image... votre image. Peu importe leur trépas, puisque vous avez répondu à l'appel, j'ai tout lieu de me réjouir. »

languages.text: {n}Adam şaşırmış görünmüyor.{/n} "Her ne kadar onları önceden tanımasam da Ata İmparator, beni onların ölümlerinin yankılarına ve bir surete... Sizin suretinize yönlendirdi. Lakin ölümleri mühim değil çünkü çağrıya siz yanıt verdiniz. Bahtiyarım."
languages.original_text: {n}The man does not look surprised.{/n} "Though I had not known them before, the Emperor-Progenitor brought me the echo of their deaths, and an image — your image. But their deaths matter not, for you have answered the call. I am elated."
